import React, { useState } from 'react' import useForm from 'react-hook-form' import { Form, Button, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' export default function PatientForm() { const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm() const onSubmit = data => { console.log(data) } //console.log(watch('firstName')) // watch input value by passing the name of it return (
Patient's First Name Patient's Last Name Parent/Guardian's First Name Parent/Guardian's Last Name Primary Phone Number {/* {required: true, maxLength: 12, pattern: /^\d{3}-\d{3}-\d{4}$/i} */} {errors.phoneNumber && Please enter in the correct format: ##########} Patient's Birthday Mailing Address {/* Could do "required" instead of this {errors.exampleRequired && This field is required} */}
) }
